author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraprojects: Outcome of board meeting
description: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on March 31, 2016, has considered, issued &amp; allotted 44,83,206 equity shares of Rs 2 each at a price of Rs 27.52 per share to CDR lenders on preferential basis on Conversion of interest on FITL as per CDR Scheme.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on March 31, 2016, inter alia, has considered and approved the following:1. Considered, issued &amp; allotted 44,83,206 equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52 per share to CDR lenders on preferential basis on Conversion of interest on FITL as per CDR Scheme.2. Considered and taken on record that the Joint Lenders Forum (JLF) at its meeting held on March 29, 2016 have approved in &quot;In principle&quot; the decision for invocation of Strategic Debt Restructuring (SDR) pursuant to RBI Circular dated June 08, 2015.3. Considered conversion of FITL into Equity pursuant to invocation of Strategic Debt Restructuring (SDR).4. Considered and approved to take Postal Ballot for obtaining Shareholders approval.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraprojects' board meeting on March 31, 2016
description: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on March 31, 2016, to consider, issue and allot equity shares to CDR Lenders against conversion of interest on FITL into equity pursuant to CDR Scheme.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on March 31, 2016,  inter-alia to consider, issue and allot equity shares to CDR Lenders against conversion of interest on FITL into equity pursuant to CDR Scheme.The Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed for Promoters, Directors, Officers and designated Employees of the Company from March 23, 2016 to April 02, 2016 (both days inclusive) pursuant to the provisions of SEBI(Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

headline: Unity Infraprojects: Outcome of board meeting
description: Unity Infraprojects in its meeting held on September 30, 2015, has considered and approved and Considered, issued &amp; allotted 83,56,176 equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52/- per share to CDR lenders on preferential basis on Conversion of interest on FITL as per CDR Scheme.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on September 30, 2015, has considered and approved the followings:1. Considered, issued &amp; allotted 83,56,176 equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52/- per share to CDR lenders on preferential basis on Conversion of interest on FITL as per CDR Scheme.2. Considered and approved to make reference to Reserve Bank of India under Structural Debt Restructuring.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraproj: Outcome of board meeting
description: Unity Infraprojects in its meeting held on July 06, 2015, has considered and approved the  Considered, issue and allotted 36,08,738 Equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52 per share to CDR Lenders pursuant to CDR Scheme. Considered, issue and allotted 2,64,20,784 Equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52 per share.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on July 06, 2015, inter alia, has considered and approved the followings:1. Considered, issue and allotted 36,08,738 Equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52 per share to CDR Lenders pursuant to CDR Scheme.2. Considered, issue and allotted 2,64,20,784 Equity shares of Rs. 2/- each at a price of Rs. 27.52 per share to Promoters/promoters group companies pursuant to CDR Scheme.3. Considered conversion of interest on FITL into Equity for the period from March 01, 2015 to March 31, 2016.4. Considered and approved to take Postal Ballot for obtaining Shareholders approval.5. Recommended to the general body to approve, ratify and confirm the Corporate Debts Restructuring Scheme through Postal Ballot.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on July 06, 2015, to consider, issue and allot equity shares to CDR Lenders on conversion of interest on FITL and promoters against their contribution pursuant to CDR Scheme.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraprojects: Outcome of Board Meeting
description: Unity Infraprojects at its meeting held on May 27, 2015, has considered and accorded its consent for not attaching the balance sheet of the Subsidiary companies pursuant to General Circular dated February 08, 2011, issued by Central Government recommended and recommended for appointment of Mrs. Vidya P. Avarsekar as Non - Executive Director.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 27, 2015, inter alia, has considered and approved the followings:1. Considered and accorded its consent for not attaching the balance sheet of the Subsidiary companies pursuant to General Circular dated February 08, 2011, issued by Central Government.2. Considered and approved to take postal ballot and/or to hold the Extra-ordinary General Meeting of the Company, i.e. June 25, 2015 Subject to SEBI Approval.3. Considered of issue of shares against conversion of interest on FITL.4. Recommended for appointment of Mrs. Vidya P. Avarsekar as Non -Executive Director.5. Board formulated and adopted the Code of Practices and Procedures for Fair Disclosure of Unpublished Price Sensitive information.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraprojects: Outcome of independent directors meeting
description: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Meeting of the Independent Directors of the Company was held on March 28, 2015.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that the Meeting of the Independent Directors of the Company was held on March 28, 2015.The Independent Directors of the Company at its meeting had discussed the following business:1. To review the performance of the Non-Independent Directors and the as a whole.2. To review the performance of the Chairman of the Company, taking into account the views of Executive Directors and Non Executive Directors.3. To consider and assesse the quality, quantity’ and timeline of flow of information between the Company management and the Board that is necessary for the Board to effectively and reasonably perform their duties.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Unity Infraproj board meeting on March 28, 2015
description: Unity Infraprojects board meeting will be held on March 28, 2015, to consider issue and allot equity shares to CDR Lenders on conversion of FITL in to equity. To consider issue and allot equity shares to promoters against promoters contribution.
articleBody: Unity Infraprojects Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on March 28, 2015, inter alia, to consider following :1. To consider issue and allot equity shares to CDR Lenders on conversion of FITL in to equity.2. To consider issue and allot equity shares to promoters against promoters contribution.3. To consider and appoint Women Director on the Board of the Company.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Unity Infraproj
